metadata.title: IQLAA - Anonymous Smoking Survey
metadata.description: IQLAA is an online platform designed to anonymously collect information from users about their smoking habits, patterns, and lifestyle factors, helping to understand and analyze smoking behaviors.
metadata.keywords: smoking habits, smoking survey, anonymous data collection, health research, smoking behavior, tobacco use, lifestyle factors, quit smoking, smoking patterns, smoking awareness, user survey, IQLAA platform, public health, smoking statistics, health insights
metadata.graphDescription: IQLAA is a platform that anonymously collects data on users' smoking habits, patterns, and lifestyle factors to provide insights for health research and awareness.
metadata.twitterDescription: Participate in IQLAA to anonymously share your smoking habits and help gather data for research and awareness.

hero.title: Share Your Experience With Smoking
hero.description: Help us understand smoking habits by sharing your experience anonymously. Your input supports research and awareness.

faqs.q2: Why do we collect this data?
faqs.r1: We are Iqlaa, a digital platform dedicated to helping smokers take control of their health by providing tools, resources, and data insights that support their journey to quit smoking.
faqs.r2: Right now, our goal is simple:
faqs.r4: To analyze and prepare this data for future use.
faqs.r5: At this stage, the data is being collected and stored securely.
faqs.r6: We do not yet provide services or recommendations â€” the data is kept for future projects and improvements.
faqs.r7: Privacy remains a top priority, your personal information is protected.

questions.phone:
Want to try the best way to recover in 90 days?
We are working on a new strategy to help people quit smoking.
If you want to be among the first to try it, enter your phone number and sign up for the waitlist.
